option.description: Specifies a login name registered in Remedy. This option has 'username' alias.
Specifies a list of login names registered in Remedy. This option has 'usernames' alias.
Specifies a field id from a specified form that will be used to identify an user account
Specifies the field value that will be used to create the qualification string that will be used to idenfy the user account
Defines a custom qualification criteria to identify the user account
Specifies the formname that will be used in order to define the structured qualification using 'userfieldid' and 'userfieldvalue' options. This option has 'userformname' alias
Defines a list of user account that could be excluded in case of the user list is returned dynamically, based on custom qualifications
